page.description: Fires after the user submits the List's Search Part to execute a search of the records in the List.

argument.name: e
argument.description: An object that contains the following properties:

property.name: recordsInQuery
property.description: The number of records found that matched the search criteria.

property.name: searchMode
property.description: The search mode that was executed. *[js:searchMode]* can be one of the following: *[js:'search']* or *[js:'clear']*.

property.name: searchWhere
property.description: Indicates where the search was performed. Can be *[js:'clientSide']* or *[js:'serverSide']*.
